definition: dignity/face (as in "losing face")/honorable/creditable/(of sb's appearance) presentable/respectable
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
to not appear to be decent or respectful/shameful

sentences.english: He seemed to have no desire to go there; besides, his clothes were not good enough.
sentences.chinese: 他似乎不想去那兒，再加他的衣服也不夠體面。

sentences.english: How can we possibly write about this in a dignified way?
sentences.chinese: 我們用體面的方法寫這個詞的可能性有多大？

sentences.english: The secret of a good old age is simply an honorable pact with solitude.
sentences.chinese: 安度晚年的祕訣，就是和孤獨簽訂體面的協議。

sentences.english: I dressed well and talked to staff in the store.
sentences.chinese: 我穿得很體面時髦，並且輕快的跟店員交談。

sentences.english: As a genre it has become quire respectable in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 這些年它已成了一種挺體面的類型小說。

sentences.english: Thirdly, why can't he make an effort to just smarten up a little.
sentences.chinese: 第三，爲什麼他不能儘量看起來體面點。

sentences.english: Doctors are wealthy and considered do-gooders.
sentences.chinese: 醫生富有並且被人認爲做着體面有益的事。

sentences.english: He has no decency, no discipline.
sentences.chinese: 他不講體面，也沒有規矩。

sentences.english: Washing dishes just doesn't sound as good as chaperoning passengers on exotic excursions.
sentences.chinese: 洗碗就不如陪同船上的旅客聽起來體面。
買一個體面的，適合坐的椅子。

sentences.english: Mr Sympson proved to be a man of spotless respectability.
sentences.chinese: 辛普森先生原來就是一位無懈可擊的體面人物。

sentences.english: So decent and smart are we, We no more need cobblers be.
sentences.chinese: 我們又體面又漂亮，我們是別無所求的小鞋匠。

sentences.english: You did not win very honourably.
She helped me understand that making money respectably is actually not that hard in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 她使我意識到在香港體面地掙錢並不太難。

sentences.english: For a while waiting at table was thought of as an indecent job in china.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，端盤子一度被認爲是不體面的工作。

sentences.english: A yes man often comes off as insincere and sleazy.
sentences.chinese: 那樣的人通常代表着不誠懇與不體面。

definition: to worry/to fret/to be anxious/to become sad
many and complicated/mired in minor details
to live one's life/to pass one's days/to get along
to have enough food and warm clothes/adequately provided
to have one's feet firmly planted on the ground (idiom); realistic without flights of fancy/steady and serious character
firmly-based/steady/steadfast/to have peace of mind/free from anxiety/Taiwan pr. [ta4 shi2]
